mapper.select: select idx, name, code from tbl_merchandise where idx > 0
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_information (uDate, pageCode, pageviews, uniquePageviews, sessions, exitRate, bounceRate, totalEvents, eventRate) values (#{uDate}, #{pageCode}, #{pageviews}, #{uniquePageviews}, #{sessions}, #{exitRate}, #{bounceRate}, #{totalEvents}, #{eventRate})
